definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Methods It was carried out in the line with the national monitoring scenario for KBD.
sentences.chinese: 方法按照国家大骨节病监测方案进行。

sentences.english: Some results from these studies demonstrated that one of the important causes of low Se in environment is …
sentences.chinese: 二是大骨节病的环境化学因素研究进展。

sentences.english: Conclusions It's a useful method to prevent KBD by exchanging grain.
sentences.chinese: 结论换粮预防大骨节病效果显著。

sentences.english: Per litre in case of open-beck method.
sentences.chinese: 每公升在案件公开骨节方法。

sentences.english: In some villages, nearly everyone has Kashin-Beck, according to Dr. Guo.
sentences.chinese: 据郭教授介绍，有的村子里几乎全村人都有大骨节病。

sentences.english: Objective Did research on the biomechanics property's effect on the viscoelasticity of tendon.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大骨节病对跟腱力学性质的影响。

sentences.english: The things I care about at this point is my grades.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个骨节上我关心的是我的成绩。

sentences.english: Conclusion The polymorphism of haplotype TGC is associated with KBD.
sentences.chinese: 结论单倍型TGC与大骨节病具有相关性。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
the four limbs of the body
